title: How would you write a 250 word essay of your objective observation and evaluation of the various speakers you watch and listen to? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don’t think I would write such an essay. This question gives no context. The first question is always “who is the audience?” And for this question specifically, who are the speakers? All the ones I see on the news programs in a day? All the speakers I happen to listen to at an academic conference? Whoever they are, I can’t think of a situation in which a 250-word essay describing and critiquing them would be the right tool for getting that information across to someone else.
